name: The Invisible Maze (ArifI21)
description:
This is a short maze game that the player must navigate to get to the end.  You are a black square in a dark maze where the route or the walls cannot be seen, which is the challenge of the game. The lights that are scattered around the maze are what the player has to utilise to navigate the maze and get to the end. Arrow keys to move.

Please let me know your thoughts on the game and thanks for playing.
